title: Shakshuka
description: This baked egg recipe works just as well for brunch as it does dinner.
ingredients: 2 red peppers, cut into long slices
2 green peppers, cut into long slices
1 tbsp tomato or red pepper purée
1 small bunch fresh coriander, roughly chopped
1 small bunch fresh parsley, roughly chopped
8 tbsp thick natural yoghurt or labneh
salt and freshly ground black pepper
